hibernate-mapping.query: select subaccounttype.Symbol from PFMORM00015 accounttype inner join accounttype.SubAccountTypes subaccounttype where accounttype.Code = :accountTypeCode and subaccounttype.Code = :subAccountTypeCode and accounttype.Active = true and subaccounttype.Active = true

select subaccounttype.AccountSignature from PFMORM00015 accounttype inner join accounttype.SubAccountTypes subaccounttype where accounttype.Code = :accountTypeCode and subaccounttype.Code = :subAccountTypeCode and accounttype.Active = true and subaccounttype.Active = true
select new subaccounttypedto( a.Id, a.Code, a.Description, a.Symbol, a.AccountSignature ) from PFMORM00022 as a where ( a.Code =: code and a.Description =: description) and a.Active = true

select new subaccounttypedto( s.Id, s.Code, s.Description, s.Symbol, s.AccountSignature, s.AccountTypeId, a.Code, a.Description, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedUserId, s.CreatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00022 as s left join s.AccountType as a where s.Active = true and a.Active = true order by a.Code asc

select new subaccounttypedto( s.Id, s.Code, s.Description, s.Symbol, s.AccountSignature, s.AccountTypeId, a.Code, a.Description, s.Active, s.TS, s.CreatedUserId, s.CreatedDate, s.UpdatedUserId, s.UpdatedDate ) from PFMORM00022 as s left join s.AccountType as a where s.Id = :id and s.Active = true and a.Active = true
select new subaccounttypedto( s.Id, s.Code, s.Description, s.Symbol, s.AccountSignature ) from PFMORM00022 as s where s.Code =: code and s.AccountTypeId =: acTypeId and s.Active = true
